div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1055 Luzanovka, suburb of Odessa, Ukraine, 1939 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 13 AE Olbia: 2 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 1, 5-6) 11 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 10-11 [10], 22 [1]) Disposition: Odessa Zograph, MASP 1 (1957), pp. 97-100
